snippet: The challenge for the United States and its allies is not just to step up the pressure on Syria, but it is also to prepare the country for a stable future.
abstract: Editorial holds challenge for the United States and its allies is not just to step up the pressure on Syria, but it is also to prepare country for a stable future; maintains Obama administration must continue to bolster its involvement with the rebels, unifying opposition factions and helping them plan a political transition.
